New Records: The #Texas Rangers at #WhiteSox game is the first in MLB history to be suspended before an out was recorded.
Others: The game is being made up on Wednesday afternoon with first pitch coming at 5:10 p.m. ET. The originally scheduled game will be played immediately following.
The White Sox enter play on Wednesday at 31-101 on the season.
The Rangers aren't having a much better season, though. They enter play on Wednesday under.500 and dealing with a rash of injuries.
